name: subsession
description: Saves tabs from current window to a subsession that can be restored on any synced desktop browser.

scripts.rm:public: cls && del /q public\* && FOR /d %D IN (public\*) DO @rd /S /Q %D || exit 0
scripts.build: npm run rm:public --silent & brunch build & npm run append:initializer
scripts.build:prod: npm run rm:public & brunch build -p & npm run append:initializer

author: elecgnosis
